        Parameters:
        obj - - an array list of objects the represent row in ProductInOrdr table in DB.
        Returns:

      • parse

                     Product prod,
                     java.math.BigInteger orderID,
                     int quantity,
                     float finalPrice)
        A function that gets all data as parameters, and creates a ProductInOrder instance with all associated data.
        Parameters:
        id - - the id of the productinorder
        prod - - the product
        orderID - - the order id
        quantity - - quantity of product
        finalPrice - - final price of all of this products
        Returns:
        new ProductInOrder instance with all the required data.
